name: 30 Dimensions
description:
30 Dimensions is a Metroidvania-Roguelike hybrid. You have to pass 30 dimensions to beat the game in under an minute. At first you start as a slime, but you can get new evolution stages with new abilities.

Controlls:

A - walk left

D - walk right

W - climb up

K - jump

ENTER - start game / upgrade 

ESC - end game

Backspace - leave Highscore and upgrade room
